title: Mordekaiser ult stack bug makes him the largest champion in League

embed.description: By stacking ults Mordekaiser can grow infinitely with his new rework

body: Stand aside {{champion:31}}  and {{champion:154}} ! There is a new T H I C C boi in town. In the practice tool, by spamming ult Mordekaiser {{champion:82}} can grow an infinite amount.
